20class Heap {

23
24 static v8::internal::Isolate* GetIsolate(Address address);
25

28

38

43 static bool IsValidHeapObject(Tagged<HeapObject> object);
44

46

48

51

53

55
56 V8_INLINE Impl* impl() { return impl_; }
57
58 private:

60};
